name: 3D Go Kart Parking - eXtreme Go Karting Driving & Racing Games
name_original: 3D Go Kart Parking - eXtreme Go Karting Driving & Racing Games
description:
You're about to get behind the wheel of a super fast go-kart racing machine.... are you ready??

In this ultra realistic racing and parking game, you need to do two things.

First, you have to navigate a variety of twists and turns to get to your checkpoint. Each checkpoint adds time to your game. As long as you reach each checkpoint, you'll be able to continue racing.

Second, once you cross the finish line, you have to successfully park your go kart. Sounds easy? It's not!

In summary, this game is a mix between a classic racing game, mixed in with a challenging parking simulator. You get the best of both worlds!

FEATURES

- All go karts unlocked!
- Realistic super HD 3D graphics.
- 10 levels to unlock!
- Multiple camera views.
- Multiple sterring options.
